user_query: I want to know the current Ethereum price in Euro or US Dollar, fetch the Tezos balance for a specific address, and check the Aave balance for an Ethereum address.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current price of Ethereum in Euro or US Dollar.
Retrieve the balance for the Tezos address tz2WDATNYnp7FdsmuZDYSidioZqeoLNZqXvE.
Check the Aave balance for the Ethereum address 0x28C6c06298d514Db089934071355E5743bf21d60 on the Ethereum network.
